text: 5:7 Ua Me Ini 22:25; Ofa Gami 25:35-37; Godɨn Araziba 23:19-20Kɨ osɨmtɨzir kam akɨrasa bar deravɨra nɨghnɨsi. Kɨ fo, gumazir dapaniba ko ingangaribar garir gumaziba, osɨmtɨzir kam gami. Egha kɨ kamaghɨn me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ian aveghbuaba ian dagɨaba ikarvazir dughiamɨn, ia me da dagɨar ekiabara isi.” Kamaghɨn kɨ osɨmtɨzir kam akɨrasa gumazamiziba, bar men diazɨ me iza uari akufa.
